resources.string: Gobang is a very old two-player board game with subtle tactics and strategies. It comes from Ancient China and is a professional variant of Go-Moku. Gomoku is traditionally played with Go pieces (black and white stones) on a go board. Black plays first, and players alternate in placing a stone of their color on an empty intersection. The winner is the first player to get an unbroken row of five stones horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
